articles.title: KCNA Report on Shining Successes Made in 150-day Campaign
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Shining Successes Made in 150-day Campaign
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a report Thursday in connection with the shining victory won by the army and people of the DPRK in the 150-day campaign.
					 According to the report, the campaign plan was carried out at 112 percent, taking the country as a whole. 
					
					 The industrial production showed a 1.2-fold increase over that in the same period last year and hundreds of objects were commissioned or underwent technological updating in that period.
					
					 The production of steel, rolled steel and Juche iron jumped several times as compared with that in the same period last year.
					
					 The workers of the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex generated 1.4 times as much electricity as that in the same period last year while those of the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Station, the Chongchongang Thermal Power Station and the Sunchon Thermal Power Station produced more electricity than planned.
					
					 In the field of coal industry the coal production swelled 1.5 times over that in the same period last year. 
					
					 More than 1,200 reserve coal cutting faces were secured to contribute to the increase of coal production.
					
					 In the field of railway transport the freight transport assignment was carried out at 118 percent.
					
					 A high-pitched drive was waged at the mines in the Tanchon area to effect a surge in production.
					
					 The field of machine-building industry timely provided necessary machines and equipment to various domains of the national economy. The quota for the production of machine tools was honored at 126 percent, that of generators at 114 percent, that of motors 122 percent and that of transformers 120 percent. 
					
					 The Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and other industrial establishments in the field of chemical industry stepped up the coal gasification projects and technological updating and waged a drive to surpass the record production level, thus increasing the production of a variety of chemical goods.
					
					 The workers in the field of forestry boosted the timber production 1.5 times as against that in the same period last year while the field of building-materials industry raised the cement production 1.4 times.
					
					 The field of light industry achieved successes by directing efforts to boosting the production of mass consumer goods.
					
					 The targets of the campaign were hit in August by the Ministry of Mining Industry, the Ministry of Machine-Building Industry, the Ministry of Electronics Industry, the Ministry of Chemical Industry, the Ministry of Forestry, the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport, the Mining Machine-Building Industry Guidance Bureau, the Tideland Reclamation Guidance Bureau, the Salt Industry Guidance Bureau and other units. At least 1,000 factories and enterprises including the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, the Ryongam Mine, the Unhung Mine, the Samsu Forestry Station and the Manpho Spinning Mill fulfilled their yearly assignments ahead of schedule.
					
					 Rice-transplanting, maize-planting, weeding and so on were carried out qualitatively in right season thanks to the devoted efforts of the agricultural workers and with the support of the whole country and all the people, bringing about a bumper crop.
					
					 The construction of the Huichon Power Station made rapid progress as nationwide efforts were focused on it to complete it till 2012. 
					
					 The soldier builders worked such a miracle as carrying out in a matter of a few months the amount of work that would have taken several years at an ordinary pace. 
					
					 The construction of the Kumyagang Power Station, the Ryesonggang Power Station, the Orangchon Power Station and the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station also made brisk headway thanks to the dynamic drive of servicepersons, builders and members of the youth shock brigades, making it possible to complete them earlier than scheduled. 
					
					 Those engaged in reclaiming the tideland on Taegye Islet wound up in the main the gigantic nature-remaking project as vast as the West Sea Barrage.
					
					 The construction of houses for 100,000 families made headway in Pyongyang under a grandiose plan for the construction of the capital city. 
					
					 The Nyongwon Power Station sprang up in the upper reaches of the River Taedong as a monumental structure in the era of Songun and went operational and there appeared the Taedonggang Tile Factory as a comprehensive centre for the production of building materials. Among those which started their operations are a new pit at the February 8 Jiktong Youth Coal Mine, the belt-conveyer inclined shaft at the Ryongdae Coal Mine, the heat ray reflection glass production process at the Taean Friendship Glass Factory. 
					
					 This period witnessed the appearance of modern buildings with all amenities for creating art works, performing activities and entertainment such as the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre and the Songdowon Youth Open-Air Theatre. 
					
					 Many buildings including Mansudae Street, the Majon Hotel and the Sohung Gymnasium sprang up one after another to add shine to the era of Songun. 
					
					 The May 11 Smeltery was reconstructed on an expansion basis to be a model production unit impeccable in all aspects. 
					
					 The Kujang Fish Farm put breeding processes on a modern and scientific basis and boosted its capacity, opening a bright prospect of rapidly increasing the production of freshwater fish. 
					
					 Various provinces registered successes in the efforts to build new general food processing factories equipped with modern facilities relying on their locally available raw and other materials or rebuilt the existing factories following the example set by the Samilpho Special Products Factory.
					
					 Scientists and technicians launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by their own efforts and with their own technology, enabling the country to proudly rank itself among the countries capable of launching satellites.
					
					 The CNC machine tool-building industry as exemplified by CNC-"Ryonha Machine" made its appearance like a comet before the world, powerfully demonstrating the spirit of Songun Korea dashing ahead toward a thriving nation on the basis of ultra modern science and technology.
					
					 The members of the shock brigades of scientists and technicians and technical innovation shock brigades of factories and enterprises across the country made a lot of scientific inventions and realized more than 9,000 technical innovation proposals.
					
					 This period also saw the production of such masterpieces as feature films "White Gem" (parts 1 and 2) and "The Country I Saw" (parts 2 and 3) and many other literary and art works. 
					
					 The shining victory of the 150-day campaign goes to clearly prove the great Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Yemen
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Yemen 
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Ali Abdullah Saleh, President of Yemen, on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the September 26 Revolution, a holiday of the Yemeni people.
					 Kim in the message wished the Yemeni President and people successes in their efforts to defend unity and stability and achieve the economic development of the country.

articles.title: Food Donated by Russian Government Arrives
articles.content:
Food Donated by Russian Government Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The food donated by the Russian government to the DPRK arrived at Rajin Port, North Hamgyong Province.
					 A donation ceremony took place on the spot on Friday. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Ji Sok, vice-minister of Food Procurement and Administration, Chae Song Hak, vice-chairman of the Rason City People's Committee, and other officials concerned.   On hand were Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, Byacheslav Chupikov, Russian consul-general in Chongjin, and officials of the Ministry of Extraordinary Situation of Russia staying in the DPRK.

articles.title: 40th Plenary Meeting of Youth League Held
articles.content:
40th Plenary Meeting of Youth League Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The 40th plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was held in Wonsan on Wednesday.
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the youth league and youth league officials from Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The meeting discussed the tasks of the youth league organizations to successfully conclude the general offensive this year by dynamically waging a 100-day campaign with the same vim and vigor with which they won a victory in the 150-day campaign.
					
					 A report was delivered by Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers proposed tasks to be fulfilled by the youth league organizations to dynamically wage a 100-day campaign on the basis of the successes made in the 150-day campaign true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and thus glorify this year as a year of a landmark turn in building a great prosperous and powerful nation and ways to do so.

articles.title: 7th National Ssirum Tournament for Grand Bull Prize Held
articles.content:
7th National Ssirum Tournament for Grand Bull Prize Held
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The 7th National Ssirum (Korean wrestling) Tournament for Grand Bull Prize was held from September 23 to 25 on Rungna Islet in Pyongyang amid the great interest of working people and sports fans.
					 The tournament, which brought together more than 100 fine grapplers selected from Pyongyang and each province, took place, divided into catch-weight and body-weight category events.
					
					 Wrestler Ri Jo Won from North Phyongan Province came first at the catch-weight event in which 20 grapplers competed on the group league match and knockout basis and thus was awarded the grand bull weighing nearly one ton, a gold bell and diploma.
					
					 In the body-weight event, the North Phyongan Provincial team came first, the Pyongyang City team second and the South Hamgyong Provincial team third in team totals.

articles.title: Songdowon Youth Open-air Theater Facelifted
articles.content:
Songdowon Youth Open-air Theater Facelifted
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Songdowon Youth Open-air Theater has been spruced up amazingly as an edifice of the Songun era in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province on the east coast of Korea.
					 The roof and eaves of the theater, with over 3,000 stair-shaped seats, were newly constructed and ornamental elements were attached to its exterior, keeping it as it was. The newly renovated theatre goes well with the landscape, preserving its modern style.
					
					 The theater has a central hall, stage, projection, makeup and musical instrument rooms and others.
					
					 Embossed on the front-wall of the central hall are magnolias, the national flower of Korea, and on its centre are the royal azaleas on Chol Pass, one of the eight Songun sceneries as a main picture.
					
					 The theater has all conditions for mass rally, lecture, forum, various kinds of meetings, art performance, film show and so on to suit the characteristics of youth and children.

articles.title: Pyongyang, International Hub of Martial Arts
articles.content:
Pyongyang, International Hub of Martial Arts
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Ten years have passed since the International Martial Arts Games Committee was founded.
					 Sok Min Chol, vice-chairman of the Executive Committee of the IMAGC told KCNA that Pyongyang is the international hub of martial arts, adding:
					
					 The committee, organized in Argentina in September of Juche 88 (1999), had its head-office in Canada temporarily.
					
					 At that time it was raised as an important issue where to establish the center for promoting the unity of the martial arts players and developing martial arts movement in accordance with their ideal.
					
					 The DPRK government saw to it that the IMAGC had its head-office in Pyongyang.
					
					 The 1st and 2nd international martial arts games were held in Pyongyang in 2004 and 2006 with a large attendance. And a torch lit on Mt. Paektu was carried to the flame cauldron of martial arts near the Taekwon-Do Hall.
					
					 It became a practice to ignite the beacon with a torch from Pyongyang in every game season.
					
					 Last year, the torch lit in Pyongyang was brought to Bangkok, the venue of the 3rd International Martial Arts Games.
					
					 Now the IMAGC has 12 international martial arts event federations and nearly 40 national martial arts games committees.
					
					 Martial arts athletes in the DPRK are striving to develop martial arts movement according to their ideal and purpose.

articles.title: Advance at "Speed of Huichon" Called for
articles.content:
Advance at "Speed of Huichon" Called for
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Let us achieve a great victory in the drive for effecting a great surge by advancing at the "speed of Huichon," a new Chollima speed! This is a militant slogan the servicepersons and people should put up in the on-going general offensive. This appeal is made by an editorial of Rodong Sinmun Friday. 
					 The editorial says:
					
					  On Sept. 17 General Secretary Kim Jong Il again provided field guidance to the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station. At that time he said that every minute and second in the construction sites of the power station witness a leaping advance and innovations and world-startling miracles are being wrought without let-up in the crucible of the high-pitched drive. He called this exceptionally high speed "the speed of Huichon". 
					
					 This is a great speed for socialist construction symbolizing and representing the present era of great surge when everyone is making a leaping advance towards a thriving nation, riding on a Songun Chollima.
					
					 The "speed of Huichon" is an expression of the intense loyalty of the servicepersons and people in the DPRK who unconditionally carry out what
					
					Kim Jong Il determines, a demonstration of the national self-esteem and mental power of the Korean people to demonstrate before the world the dignity and national power of Kim Il Sung's Korea.  And it is, at the same time, an expression of the popular heroism of the servicepersons and people, their hearts burning with faith in socialism. 
					
					 The above-said speed represents the speed of advance of the great harmonious whole that can be created in Songun Korea only where the plan and resolution of the leader reflect the will of all the servicepersons and people and they are put into practice. 
					
					 This speed promises a rosy future of Songun Korea as it helps give full play to the essential advantages and vitality of Korean-style socialism based on collectivism, which keeps its real feature alive. 
					
					 The creation of the above-said speed is a brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's strategy for building a thriving nation and his outstanding leadership ability.
					
					 The creation of the speed marks a historic event of great significance in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution, the editorial notes, adding that this speed represents the most shining success made in the 150-day campaign and serves as a banner encouraging all the servicepersons and people to bring about uninterrupted innovations and progress. 
					
					 The editorial calls on all officials and other party members and working people to dynamically advance at the "speed of Huichon" in hearty response to the call of the Party and thus successfully conclude the drive for effecting a great surge this year and make a breakthrough towards winning a final victory on all fronts.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically along the Road of Socialism and Communism under the Unfurled Banner of the Anti-Imperialist Struggle" serves as a highly important document as it clarifies theoretical and practical issues of weighty importance in accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism and the cause of socialism in the present era. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article devoted to the anniversary of the publication of the work. 
					 The article goes on: 
					
					 The work, published on September 25, Juche 76 (1987), teaches the revolutionary people the precious immutable truth that the nature of imperialism never changes and if one is to take the road of anti-imperialist struggle to the last one should grasp the advantages of socialism and its inevitable victory as faith and clarifies the precious revolutionary immutable principle that in order to successfully push ahead with the cause of socialism the people should direct main efforts to strengthening the driving force for the revolution.
					
					 Today the Korean people are looking back with high pride and self-esteem on the path of struggle covered by them under the uplifted banners of Songun and independence against imperialism, remaining true to the Workers' Party of Korea. But for the Korean people's belief that Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is the best and confidence of sure victory of their cause, they would not have been able to weather out such the worst trial as the "arduous march," the forced march.
					
					 The Songun politics of the WPK is a brilliant embodiment of the idea and theory set forth in the work as it is strengthening in every way the singled-minded unity of the Party and the revolutionary ranks with the Korean People's Army as a core force.
					
					 The army and the people in the DPRK are now achieving signal successes on the anti-imperialist military front and the overall socialist construction, united close as one around the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 The might of socialism is the might of the driving force for the revolution and that of the single-minded unity. Korean-style socialism is sure to always triumph thanks to the powerful driving force that has grown strong under the Songun leadership of the Party.

articles.title: Director-General of IIJI Appreciates Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Director-General of IIJI Appreciates Korean People's Struggle
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- I was deeply impressed by the reality of the DPRK fully demonstrating its dignity and might under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. Director-General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea Vishwanath said this when interviewed by KCNA before his departure from here. 
					The Korean people are now dynamically pushing ahead with the building of a rich and powerful nation on the basis of powerful military capability and self-supporting national economy and firmly defending and glorifying socialism with the might of single-minded unity, weathering trials and difficulties, he noted, and went on:
					
					 This instills great strength and courage into the world progressive people.
					
					 The successes made in the DPRK clearly prove that a country can be a great country and its people can emerge a great people only when they have an outstanding leader.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people all out in the general offensive for building a thriving nation of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Remembered in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Remembered in Czech Republic 
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea jointly issued a bulletin on Sept. 20 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The Everlasting Memory of
					
					 Kim Jong Suk" referred to the fact that Kim Jong Suk embarked on the road of the anti-Japanese armed struggle for the liberation of the country with arms in hand in her early years, adding that she set a noble example in protecting President Kim Il Sung, peerlessly great man produced by the Korean nation, regarding him as the heart and brain of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The greatest feat performed by Kim Jong Suk was that she made sure that the cause of the President was successfully carried forward generation after generation, the bulletin noted, introducing the undying exploit she performed by providing a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 It continued: General Secretary Kim Jong Il has firmly defended socialism in the DPRK true to the idea and cause of the President and ushered in a new era of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					Eternally prospering socialist Korea today would be unthinkable without the inspiration of Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Switzerland and Mongolia and seminars in Mexico between Sept. 16 and 20 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee in a speech said that Woman Commander of Mt. Paektu Kim Jong Suk protected President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life, firmly defended and implemented his idea and line and provided a sure guarantee for carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The head of the Morelos Branch of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism in a speech said that the life of Kim Jong Suk boundlessly revered by the Korean people and the progressives of the world is shinning as a great life characterized by total devotion.
					
					 The head of the Pachuca Branch of the Hidalgo State Group of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea said in his speech that the greatest exploit performed by her was that she gave birth to lodestar of Mt. Paektu Kim Jong Il to be the great leader of the Korean people, thereby providing steady continuity to the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President. 
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the functions held in Switzerland and Mongolia.

articles.title: ATCC informa exitos de campana de 150 dias
articles.content:
ATCC informa exitos de campana de 150 dias
 Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea hizo publica el dia 24 la informacion en relacion con que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea lograron una brillante victoria en la campana de 150 dias
					  Segun el documento,  durante este periodo el plan combativo de escala nacional se cumplio en 112%.
					
					  La produccion industrial se aumento a 1.2 veces en comparacion con el mismo periodo del ano pasado y cientos de objetos fueron inaugurados o  reconstruidos.
					
					  La produccion del acero, los materiales de acero laminados y el hierro Juche  se aumentaron a varias veces mas que el mismo periodo del ano pasado.
					
					  Los obreros del Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang incrementaron a 1.4 veces la  generacion de la  energia electrica con respecto al mismo periodo de 2008 y las centrales termoelectricas de Pyongyang Este, Chongchongang y Sunchon produjeron mucho la electricidad que el plan.
					
					  El dominio de la industria carbonifera aumento a 1.5 veces la produccion en comparacion con el mismo periodo del ano pasado.
					
					  Fueron preparadas mas de mil 200 lugares de extraccion de carbon de reserva, que contribuyeron al aumento de la produccion carbonifera.
					
					  El dominio de transporte ferroviario sobrecumplio en 18 por ciento el plan de transporte de cargas.
					
					  En las minas de la zona de Tanchon avivaron  furiosamente las llamas de gran auge.
					
					  El sector de industria mecanica aseguro a tiempo las maquinas y equipos necesarios a varios dominios de la economia nacional, o sea, se cumplio a 126% la produccion de maquinas herramientas, a 114% la de los generadores electricos, a 122% la de motores y a 120% la de transformadores.
					
					  El Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung, el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam, el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y otras fabricas y empresas del dominio de industria quimica desarrollaron la lucha por acelerar la obra de objeto de gasificacion y la reconstruccion tecnica y superar el nivel de la produccion maxima e incrementaron la produccion de varios articulos quimicos.
					
					  Los obreros del dominio de silvicultura elevaron a 1.5 veces la produccion de maderos y los del sector de la industria de materiales de construccion, a 1.4 veces la produccion de cemento, respectivamente en comparacion con el mismo periodo del ano pasado.
					
					  El sector de industria ligera logro exitos prestando  las fuerzas a la produccion de articulos de consumo popular.
					
					  Los Ministerios de Industria Extractiva, de Industria Mecanica, de Industria Electronica,  de Industria Quimica, de Silvicultura, de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo, las Direcciones de Industria de Maquinas Extractivas, de Roturacion de Marismas, de Industria de Sal y otras unidades terminaron en agosto sus planes para la campana de 150 dias.
					
					  Tambien, mas de mil fabricas y empresas, entre otras, la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, la Fabrica de Alambres Electricos 326 de Pyongyang, la Mina de Ryong-am, la Mina de Unhung, el Centro Forestal de Samsu y la Fabrica de Hilado de Manpho cumplieron con anticipacion sus planes anuales.
					
					  Gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados de los  trabajadores agricolas y el apoyo de todo el pais y todo el pueblo se realizaron de manera cualitativa en el tiempo apropiado el trasplante de posturas de arroz, la siembra de maiz, la desyerba y otras faenas agricolas y se preparo un otono rico.
					
					   Al concentrarse las fuerzas estatales a la labor para terminar hasta el ano 2012 la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon se logro un gran progreso en esta obra.
					
					  Los constructores militares produjeron el prodigio de haber cumplido en unos meses la obra que  demanda unos anos en el tiempo ordinario.
					
					  Tambien,  los ingentes esfuerzos de los militares, constructores y miembros de la brigada juvenil posibilitaron anticipar el dia de la inauguracion de las centrales hidroelectricas de Kumyagang, Ryesonggang, Orangchon y Juventud Songun-Paektusan.
					
					  Los roturadores de la marisma en la isla Taegye terminaron principalmente la gran obra de transformacion natural, obra comparable con la construccion del Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste.
					
					  Segun el grandioso proyecto de la construccion de la capital se promovio la construccion de viviendas para 100 mil familias en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  Quedo inaugurada la Central Hidroelectrica de Nyongwon como creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) en el curso superior del rio Taedong y se construyo la Fabrica de Azulejos Taedonggang, asi como se pusieron en funcionamiento la nueva galeria de la Mina de Carbon Juventud de Jiktong 8 de Febrero, la galeria inclinada de correa en la Mina de Carbon de Ryongdae, el proceso de produccion de vidrio por la reflexion de rayos del calor en la Fabrica de Vidrio Amistad de Taean, etc.
					
					  Fueron edificados los modernos centros culturales dispuestos de todas las condiciones necesarias a la creacion artistica, la funcion y el espectaculo incluyendo el Teatro de Arte de la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte y el Anfiteatro Juventud de Songdowon.
					
					  Se levantaron uno tras otro la avenida de Mansudae, el Hotel Majon, el Palacio de Deportes de Sohung y otras creaciones que hacen brillar la epoca del Songun.
					
					  La Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos 11 de Mayo fue reconstruida y ampliada como empresa magnifica y unidad ejemplar que no tiene ningun defecto en todos los aspectos.
					
					  El Criadero de Peces de Kujang dejo abierta la firme perspectiva para incrementar rapidamente la produccion de peces de agua dulce mediante la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos de la cria de peces y la ampliacion de la capacidad.
					
					  Tambien, se alcanzaron exitos en las labores para construir los combinados de alimentos o reconstruir las fabricas que se apoyan en las materias primas propias y se disponen de los equipos modernos en cada provincia siguiendo la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho.
					
					  Los cientificos y tecnicos lanzaron con las propias fuerzas y tecnicas el satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No. 2" permitiendo que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea entrara dignamente en la fila de los paises de lanzamiento de satelite.
					
					  La "maquina Ryonha"-CNC, la industria de maquinas herramientas CNC, que aparecio como estrella ante el mundo, mostro energicamente el impetu de Corea del Songun que avanza hacia la gran potencia prospera sobrepasando las tecnicas de punta.
					
					  Los miembros de las brigadas de cientificos y tecnicos despachados a todas partes y los miembros de las brigadas de innovacion tecnica de las fabricas y empresas del pais presentaron numerosas invenciones cientificas y realizaron mas de 9 mil proyectos de innovacion tecnica.
					
					  Fueron creadas y completadas muchas obras literarias y artisticas incluyendo las peliculas de ficcion "Gema blanca" (primera y segunda partes) y "Mi pais que conoci" (segunda y tercera partes).
					
					  El brillante triunfo de la campana de 150 dias demuestra fehacientemente la grandeza de la direccion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por nueva velocidad Chollima, "la de Huichon"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por nueva velocidad Chollima, "la de Huichon"
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Logremos el brillante triunfo del gran auge con la nueva velocidad Chollima, "la velocidad de Huichon", esto es precisamente la consigna combativa que debemos enarbolar en la ofensiva general de hoy.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en el editorial del dia 25 y continua:
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien volvio a dirigir el  dia 17 sobre el terreno la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon, dijo que cada minuto y segundo en ese lugar devienen precisamente el salto e innovacion y en este crisol de fervor se crean incesantemente los milagros que asombran a todos los hombres del mundo y denomino esa velocidad extraordinaria como "la velocidad de Huichon".
					
					  Esta es la gran velocidad de la construccion socialista que simboliza y representa la epoca del gran auge de hoy que avanza a todo galope en Chollima (caballo alado) del Songun (priorizacion militar) hacia la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Es tambien la expresion de la ferviente fidelidad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que cumplen incondicionalmente lo que decide el Dirigente, la explosion del poderio espiritual basado en el fuerte orgullo de la nacion tendente a exaltar a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio estatal de Corea de Kim Il Sung y la muestra del heroismo masivo del ejercito y el pueblo que guardan en el corazon la conviccion firme en el socialismo.
					
					  Ademas, deviene la velocidad de avance de la gran unidad monolitica que se puede crear solo en Corea del Songun donde el proyecto y la decision del Dirigente se convierten en la voluntad y practica de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo.
					
					  La "velocidad de Huichon", en que se mantiene firmemente la esencia del socialismo y se ponen de pleno manifiesto la superioridad esencial y el poderio del socialismo al estilo coreano basado en el colectivismo, hace imaginar con orgullo el futuro perspectivo de la Corea del Songun.
					
					  La creacion de esta velocidad deviene el brillante cristaloide de la estrategia de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y la capacidad de destacada direccion del Dirigente.
					
					  Tambien, deviene el evento historico que tiene suma importancia para el Partido del Trabajo y la historia revolucionaria de Corea.
					
					  Por lo tanto, es el mas brillante exito de la campana de 150 dias y la bandera estimulante de la innovacion y marcha incesantes.
					
					  En acato al llamamiento del partido, todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores deben marchar dinamicamente con la nueva velocidad, la "velocidad de Huichon", para llevar a feliz termino el combate de gran auge de este ano y abrir de par en par la brecha para el triunfo final en todos los sectores.

articles.title: Efectuado 40o pleno de CC de Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sun
articles.content:
Efectuado 40o pleno de CC de Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en la ciudad de Wonsan el 40o pleno del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					A la ocasion asistieron los miembros y los suplentes del CC de la UJS y los funcionarios de esta entidad juvenil en el centro y localidades. 
					
					La reunion discutio las tareas de las organizaciones de la union juvenil para terminar con brillantez la batalla de ofensiva general de este ano mediante el energico despliegue de la campana de 100 dias con aquel impetu y vigor de haber llevado al triunfo la campana de 150 dias.
					
					Ri Yong Chol, primer secretario del CC de la UJS, presento el informe y otros intervinieron.
					
					Los oradores presentaron las tareas y medios de las organizaciones juveniles para librar con audacia la campana de 100 dias basandose en los exitos logrados en la de 150 dias y hacer de 2009 el ano de viraje decisivo en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anfiteatro Juventud de Songdowon
articles.content:
Anfiteatro Juventud de Songdowon
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En la ciudad de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon situada en la costa oriental de Corea fue construido el Anfiteatro Juventud de Songdowon, otra creacion de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					El moderno teatro con mas de 3 mil asientos de forma escalonada esta muy adecuado al paisaje natural. Su exterior mantiene la estructura del anterior edificio y el techo y aleros de este fueron formados nuevamente combinando los elementos decorativos.
					
					El anfiteatro esta compuesto del hall central, la cabina de proyeccion, el vestuario, la sala conservacion de instrumentos musicos, varias habitaciones y la escena.
					
					En la pared frontal del hall central esta esculpida al relieve la magnolia, flor nacional de Corea y en el centro se ve dibujado el "Rododendro del puerto Chol", uno de los 8 paisajes del Songun.
					
					El teatro esta dispuesto de todas las condiciones favorables a diversas actividades de los jovenes y ninos como mitin, conferencia, encuentros de diversos fines, funcion artistica, proyeccion filmica, etc.
